name: Galawars
description:
Fly from bottom to top may sound like an easy task, but think again and try our unique levels full of obstacles and beautiful patterns. Advance through the levels and see how each level is harder than the previous one.

How to play:

Tap to move forward, avoid all the enemies and collect all the stars you can. You need to wait for the right moment to move otherwise your ship will be reduced to space dust.

Features:
- 100+ crazy levels
- 13 unique spaceships
- Intuitive and easy controls.
- Simple and beautiful graphics.
- Hours and hours of fun!!!
